headline: The Campbell’s Company to Participate in a Fireside Chat at BofA Securities 2025 Consumer and Retail Conference on March 11
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., February 27, 2025--The Campbell's Company (NASDAQ:CPB) (Campbell’s) today announced that Mick Beekhuizen, President and Chief Executive Officer, and Carrie Anderson, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, will participate in a fireside chat at the BofA Securities 2025 Consumer and Retail Conference on Tuesday, March 11, 2025 at 8:50 a.m. EST.
